content: Hi all, we're looking at implementing ccda -> fhir r4 mappings. Have there been any WIP updates to the specs on this/FML implementations? Our STU3 implementation updated to R4 is not the best as the resource mappings aren't 1:1, but I haven't seen any canonical mappings out in public.

@Nimish Telang et al.
Do I see that you are in the throes of developing maps from CCD to FHIR? If so, I too am in that predicament. I have volumes of CCDs to convert and am faced with developing a map(s). Are we in similar situations?
